fillNDGConditionsForWuProver

public int fillNDGConditionsForWuProver()
Method that fills polynomial system for NDG conditions after triangulation has been performed on system of hypotheses. This is used in Wu's method.

Returns:
SUCCESS if successful, general error code otherwise.

fillNDGConditionsForGroebnerBasisProver

public int fillNDGConditionsForGroebnerBasisProver()
Method that fills polynomial system for NDG conditions for Groebner basis prover.

Returns:
SUCCESS if successful, general error code otherwise.
